section.title: Installing Client Machines
section.para: Because CentOS Studio creates solutions in a standard operating system format, client machines can be deployed using the same tools and methods as used for Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) and CentOS.

itemizedlist.listitem: Network installation using a network interface card (NIC) with Pre-Execution Environment (PXE) support, CD/DVD or USB boot media.
CD/DVD installation (for use in environments with limited network connectivity).
Virtual machine installation using the virt-manager or virt-install tools provided with RHEL and CentOS 5.4 operating systems

section.para: See the section on for complete information.
